qas.question: What was Armenia's status from 1918 to 1920?
When did communists take over Armenia?
What part of the USSR did Armenia join?
When did Armenia leave the USSR?
When was the Red Army part of an independent republic after the Russian Empire breakup?
When did Russia become independent from the USSR?
When did the Russian Empire come to power and invade the Transcaucasian SFSR?
What part of the Red Army did the communists join in 1991?

context: Following the breakup of the Russian Empire in the aftermath of World War I for a brief period, <b5_0>from 1918 to 1920<b5_0/>, Armenia was an <a0_0>independent republic<a0_0/>. In <a1_0>late <b8_0>1920<b8_0/><a1_0/>, the communists came to power following an invasion of Armenia by <a2_0><b6_0>the Red Army<b6_0/><a2_0/>, and in 1922, Armenia became part of <a3_0><b9_0>the Transcaucasian SFSR<b9_0/><a3_0/> of the Soviet Union, later forming the Armenian Soviet Socialist Republic (1936 to September 21, 1991). <b7_0>In <a4_0>1991<b7_0/><a4_0/>, Armenia declared independence from the USSR and established the second Republic of Armenia.
